Sentencas: The purpose of the current study is to numerically evaluate the effect of coplanar and perpendicular catalyst layer configurations on the performance of a single chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC).
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Three different catalyst layer configurations, coplanar, single-cell perpendicular and two-cell stack are used.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Fuel is a mixture of hydrogen and air (50% hydrogen and 50% air by volume).
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: An in-house computational fluid dynamics code is utilized to solve the nonlinear governing equations of mass, momentum, energy, charge balance and gas-phase species coupled with kinetics equations.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Results show that the perpendicular catalyst layer configuration is more suitable for SC-SOFC than the coplanar configuration.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This is due to shorter, path of the oxygen ion transportation from cathode to anode in perpendicular compared to coplanar configuration.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In addition, results indicate that adding another anode and cathode electrode on the other face of the electrolyte and providing a simple two-cell stack improve the cell performance.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Finally, in order to present a suitable configuration of a SCSOFC two-cell stack, a parametric study is performed.
Titulo: Effect of catalyst layer configuration on single chamber solid oxide fuel cell performance
